about_the_game:
Item Rarities and Drop Rates:
The game features a diverse range of items, each with its own rarity and corresponding drop rate:

Common (50%)
Uncommon (24%)
Rare (12%)
Epic (7%)
Exotic (4%)
Mythical (2%)
Legendary (1%)
These probabilities determine how frequently you’ll obtain each rarity type. Common items are abundant, while legendary items are extremely rare and highly sought after.

Steam Marketplace Integration:
The game integrates with the Steam Marketplace, allowing players to acquire items from the market. This enriches the game's ecosystem, providing access to a wide array of items beyond those available in the in-game drop system.

Crafting and Item Drops:
Players can craft new items by combining five items of the same rarity. The crafted item will have a higher rarity, offering players a way to upgrade their inventory.

Time-Based Item Drops:
Every 30 minutes of gameplay, players receive a new item drop. This system ensures a steady influx of items, encouraging continued play and engagement.

Showcase Feature:
Players can use the items they collect to create words in their Steam profile showcase. This feature allows for a personalized touch, as players can arrange items to spell out their favorite words, messages, or names. The showcase adds a social and creative element to the game, making each item more valuable and meaningful.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400 / AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Alphabet is an exciting clicker that will immerse you in the world of letters and words. In this game you can get letters of different rarity for the time spent in the game. Collect letters, discover new words and use them to create unique items.
